full_summary:
Dairy Products and Eggs Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSOs) - Solicitation #WS4162003242
=====================================

**Solicitation Number:** WS4162003242  
**Amendment:** 2  
**Publication Date:** 2023-09-07  
**Close Date:** 2023-10-17 14:00 EDT (Closed)  
**Based on:** [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17389439?extsite=MTczODk0MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer  
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru FTA, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Honduras FTA, Canada-Chile FTA, Canada-EU CETA, CPTPP, WTO GPA

**Description:**
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking to establish Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSOs) for the supply and delivery of dairy products and eggs to authorized users on an as-and-when- needed basis. The Ontario Region has been divided into six geographic zones: Southern Ontario, Central Ontario, North Western Ontario, North Eastern Ontario, National Capital Region, and Eastern Ontario.

**Key Requirements:**
* Supply and delivery of dairy products and eggs on an as-and-when- needed basis.
* Multiple blanket standing offers per zone are anticipated.

**Regions of Delivery:**
* Ottawa
* Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

**Negotiation Information:**
* Base Bid to be submitted with the RFSA.
* Zero advance payment.  
* Medium-term notice schedule (recommended); Standard delivery requirements.
* Maximum 12-month contract duration.

**Delegation of Authority:**
The contracting authority has delegated bidding and procurement authority to the Director, Acquisition Solution Unit, Level 4A, Canterbury Building, 320 Queen Street, Toronto, Ontario M5W 0G4.

**For More Information:**
Please contact [Mohamed Shawky Elgallab](mailto:mohamedshawky.elgallab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) at PSPC/SPAC or visit [Canada's procurement website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/procurement-notices).
